name: Cherry Shortbread Bars
author: Anya
summary: I got this delicious recipe for cherry shortbread bars from my mother-in-law.
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a 9x13-inch pan with heavy aluminum foil
Mix flour, 1 cup butter, and white sugar together until mixture is crumbly
Press into the bottom of the prepared pan
Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes
Blend brown sugar, eggs, salt, baking powder, and vanilla extract together in a bowl
Drain and chop cherries, reserving the liquid
Stir cherries and walnuts into the egg mixture
Place mixture on top of the baked crust
Return to the oven and bake until set, about 25 minutes
Remove from the oven and let cool
Combine powdered sugar and 1 1/2 tablespoons butter with enough cherry liquid to spread easily
Cut into squares after icing has set
